articles.title: A new damselfly species is sharing habitat with UK natives - Phys.org
articles.description: A damselfly species that came to the UK from Europe poses a minimal risk to native damselflies and dragonflies, new research shows.
articles.content:
A damselfly species that came to the UK from Europe poses a minimal risk to native damselflies and dragonflies, new research shows.

articles.title: Shell challenged by investor lawsuit over climate risk for energy transition - Pensions & Investments
articles.description: Pension fund investors in the U.K. and Europe are backing a novel lawsuit seeking to change how Shell manages climate risk and plans for the energy transition.
